title: Patch 6.8 is live!

embed.description: Updating old splash arts to be the same in all regions. Part several of several. Context here's the same as with last patch. These splash swaps are short term changes to ensure players in all regions see the same splashes. They aren't taking the place of proper upgrades (like the ones in the section above)!

body:
Hi folks,

Patch 6.8 is live on Oceania. You can read the full patch notes [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-68-notes).

We'll be watching this thread so let us know here if you encounter any strange issues today so we can check it out!


**KNOWN ISSUES**

* **[FIXED]** The Leagues tab is currently displaying incorrect information, and not showing player ranks.  This is just a display issue and we're working to get it fixed.  Ranked is still available as games are still being counted in the backend.



Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: Solid work rito. All seem like good updates.  Will deffo get some infernal diana action.
Why am i back in placements for ranked?
Checking - what rank/league/LP do you think you should you be in?

When i logged off right when ranked queues went down i was gold 1 69lp, now it says that i am in placements.

edit: i mean rank 1 challanger 10000points :^)

OK I'll set you back to challenger.   j/k

We're seeing a few reports of  ranks not displaying, so just stay tuned and we'll find out what the cause is.

Cheers

UPDATE: it appears that rank information in our backend is still correct, however there is a display issue with the Leagues tab, which is causing the issues you are seeing.  We're working to find a fix.
I was in silver 4 promos somehow i'm put in placements.
XIN ZHAOS THIGHS ðŸ˜ƒ
Excuse me Riot. How can we refund now? I can't navigate the new shop menu and find where I used to be able to see how many refunds I have and what I can refund....

Click your account info (near top right), and go into your purchase history.

In your history it will show the number of refunds remaining (top left), and you can press the refund button beside each line item.

Let me know how you go!

Cheers
Mindstar

Is the store update suppose to be out yet?
Because I still have the old one.

Hi

We released the store visual update overnight last night.  You should see it now.

Cheers
Mindstar
Just saying there is currently a problem with RP purchases
installed the new patch. now i can't launch the game.

What happens when you try and launch?   One place you could try for troubleshooting steps is the support page on [patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).
Riot please fix the issue with the prepaid riot point cards seeing as we spent our money to support you, but have not received what we paid for

^^ I agree with Lucas Please get on top off the issues in hand we have spent a lot of money to support your game and all we ask is for what we paid for please help us by fixing this and giving us what we paid for.

i activated two $10 RP  prepaid cards while the client said rp purchases are disabled and did not receive my rp. it came up with a message saying your rp has been successfully redeemed yet my account did not receive the 2200 RP.

i activated a $50 rp prepaid card while the client said rp purchases are disabled and did not receive my rp. it came up with a message saying your rp has been successfully redeemed yet my account did not receive the points
Is it? The only thing that seems to be released is Taric right now.

Hi folks - 

I've added to the known issues list above:

* The Leagues tab is currently displaying incorrect information, and not showing player ranks. This is just a display issue and we're working to get it fixed. Ranked is still available as games are still being counted in the backend.

Let me know if you have any questions!
This has been fixed now - ranks should be displaying correctly again.

I joined a game playing as taric, I got mastery 5 and pink Taric mhm. The game crashed during the loading screen, alright it happens. I join back in, NOTHING is visible, I have 0 gold. Ok that's bad I exit and rejoin everything is fixed I waste my teleport to get back into lane. After the first wave is cleared, EVERYTHING freezes. My ping was fine, it went between 30-50 and the fps was stable animations were still playing, nothing was moving at all. I quit from there.
Yeah when are they going to fix this Placements crap? anyone know on any info on it since it didn't say anything about it in the patch notes ?
